  • Method Details

    • getAppVersions

      public java.util.Optional<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutableTriple<java.util.List<AppVersionDto>,​java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Long>> getAppVersions​(FilterMode mode, java.lang.Integer page, java.lang.Integer size, java.lang.String sortDir, java.lang.String sort)
      Description copied from interface: IAppQueryService
      Gets the application versions stored in the taxonomy service database with respect to the filter mode and paging/sorting parameters.

      Supported filter modes:
      All: all application versions
      Categorized: all application versions with at least one assigned category
      NotCategorized: all application versions with no assigned category

      Specified by:
      getAppVersions in interface IAppQueryService
      Parameters:
      mode - the filter mode
      page - the page number
      size - the page size
      sortDir - the sort direction
      sort - the sort column
      Returns:
      the found application versions;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • toCategoryDto

      private AppCategoryDto toCategoryDto​(Category category)
      Converts a Category object to an AppCategoryDto.
      Parameters:
      category - the source object
      Returns:
      null if the target object is null;
      otherwise, the converted object
